amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that amends the Paperwork Reduction Act definition of information collection to include "the disclosure to third parties or the public" of information, effectively preserving the 1990 Supreme Court decision regarding the regulatory oversight authority of OMB.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill that amend the Paperwork Reduction Act definition of information collection to include "the disclosure to third parties or the public" of information. The effect of the amendment would be to preserve the 1990 Supreme Court decision restricting the regulatory oversight authority of OMB.

action.text: On agreeing to the Collins (IL) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 254 (Roll No. 155).
